text: Eliseo Prado (17 September 1929 – 10 February 2016) was an Argentine football forward. He played for Argentina in the 1958 FIFA World Cup. He also played for Club Atlético River Plate. He was born in Buenos Aires. Prado died of complications from Alzheimer's disease in Buenos Aires on 10 February 2016. He was aged 86. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Footballers from Buenos Aires Category:Association football forwards
title: Eliseo Prado
